title: Confirmed 2024 bank holidays for England and Wales, including three days off in April and May
text:
Many of us wish for warm and sunny weather on days off
Eight bank holidays are in store for the people of England and Wales in 2024. Many people like to take advantage and organise their time off work around the bank holidays that come throughout the year, so you may want to take note of the dates.
If a bank holiday falls on a weekend, a “substitute” weekday then assumes bank holiday status. This is usually the first Monday that precedes the bank holiday.
Not everyone gets to enjoy bank holidays, though, as employers do not have to give their employees paid leave on bank or public holidays. Bank holidays may also affect how and when your benefits are paid, as reported by the Liverpool Echo.
Full list of bank holidays in 2024 in England and Wales: Monday, January 1 – New Year’s Day Friday, March 29 – Good Friday Monday, April 1 – Easter Monday Monday, May 6 – Early May bank holiday Monday, May 27 – Spring bank holiday Monday, August 26 – Summer bank holiday Wednesday, December 25 – Christmas Day Thursday, December 26 – Boxing Day Click here for more employment news from BristolLive.
